DOC.brief_title: Safety Study FSME-IMMUN NEW Healthy Children Adolescents Aged 1 15 Years
DOC.criteria: Male female child adolescent eligible participation study : age 1 year ( 1st birthday ) < 16 year ( last day 16th birthday ) ; clinically healthy , ( i. e. physician would reservations vaccinate FSMEIMMUN NEW outside scope clinical trial ) ; parents/legal guardian understand nature study agree provision ; write informed consent available parents/legal guardian , Germany/Austria : additional write informed consent available child older 8 year parents/legal guardian agree keep volunteer diary . For safety reason , female volunteer reach sexual maturity study start meet follow additional inclusion criterion : negative pregnancy test study entry ; Children adolescent exclude participation study : history TBE vaccination ; history TBE infection ; history allergic reaction one component vaccine ; suffer disease ( e.g . autoimmune disease ) undergo form treatment ( e.g . systemic corticosteroid , chemotherapeutics ) expect influence immunological function ; know HIV positive ( special HIV test require purpose study ) ; receive bank blood immunoglobulin within one month study entry ; history vaccination yellow fever and/or Japanese Bencephalitis ; suffer hemorrhagic diathesis ; participate simultaneously another clinical trial ; female : pregnant breastfeeding . Volunteers meet inclusion/exclusion criterion , febrile illness ( body temperature > 38Â°C ) schedule time vaccination , vaccinate body temperature return normal . Volunteers receive vaccination within 4 week prior visit 1 vaccinate interval 4 week pass . In case visit 1 take place separately . If volunteer receive antipyretic within 4 hour prior intend TBE vaccination , vaccination perform late time .
